title: Beck Dorey-Stein: "From The Corner Of The Oval"
description: Michael's conversation with Beck Dorey-Stein, former stenographer to President Obama. Her book is "From the Corner of the Oval: A Memoir." Original air date 28 July 2018. The book was published on 10 July 2018.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Beck Dorey Stein)
